text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0203
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    EIIdentifiant d'employéA number that uniquely identifies an employee to an employer.
  • Include these codes as defined in http://interopsante.org/fhir/CodeSystem/fr-v2-0203
    CodeDisplay
    ADELIN° ADELI
    RPPSN° RPPS
    IDNPSIdentifiant National de Professionnel de Santé
    INTRNIdentifiant interne
  • Include these codes as defined in https://mos.esante.gouv.fr/NOS/TRE_G08-TypeIdentifiantPersonne/FHIR/TRE-G08-TypeIdentifiantPersonne
    CodeDisplay
    1Id cabinet ADELI/n° registre
    3FINESS/n° de registre
    4SIREN/n° de registre
    5SIRET/n° de registre
    6Id cabinet RPPS/n° de registre

extension.valueMarkdown: Types are for general categories of identifiers. See [the identifier registry](identifier-registry.h     tml) for a list of common identifier systems

name: FRCoreValueSetPractionerIdentifierType
title: FR Core ValueSet Practioner identifier type
description: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for    a specific purpose (providers identification)

concept.display: Identifiant National de Professionnel de Santé
